author: mdhildreth
body: Replaces PR 7853.  Final additions: definition of digi validation step within PreMixing, correct threading of all of the different HO digitizers in HcalDigitizer.  This PR is a catch-up cleanup for all of the changes made in the 74X cycle that happened after the original PreMixing forward-port from 70X.
title: 74 x pre mixing cleanup
